name: Benjamin Davis-Minjarez
text: Great service inside the office, however you can never actually call and speak to someone especially with a medication question. You have to leave a message and wait on them to call you. Not convenient for living 45 min away and having to drive just to have this type of concern answered. Otherwise love the staff they are all super friendly.

name: candacelateya Johnson
text: I absolutely love Dr.Allen an his entire staff.Alway’s very helpful an motivating .I’ve been an patient since 2006 an the quality of the service has been the same. .

name: Darlene Whelan
text: Dr. Allen is simply amazing.  Best results ever found for my migraines.

name: Stephanie Sanderson-Garrett
text: My cousin recommended Tam's when I moved here about 18 months ago.    The experience was great, and I've been going there ever since.  A huge plus for me is her timeliness.  Not only does she take you on time, but she also doesn't make you wait in between stations.  She's professional, does great work, and cares about the health of your hair.  And, the customer service is great.  I highly recommend!!

name: Sascha Blackburn
text: Everyone is very friendly, and Kia is amazing.  My daughter loves her sisterlocks!

name: Dee
text:
I've been using Tam's Natural Solutions Cosmetics for about 2 years and I love it!  I get a press and curl.  There are so many different types of services offered and all are awesome!
Tam makes her own products and she knows what she is doing.  My hair has  grown so much since she has been taking care of it with her products.
I recommend this business to anyone who wants to get the best hair care.

name: Bree Fornis
text: I went to Tam for the first time for a deep conditioning, trim, and silk press. Tam is professional, kind, and knowledgeable. She definitely taught me a few things about caring for my hair! She was right on time and got me in and out pretty quick. I will definitely be back and be recommending her to my natural friends!

name: Erin Coffey
text: I'm someone who is very particular about who touches my hair. Tam did an amazing job! She used her own products (which smelled amazing) and gave me the silkiest silk press I've ever seen. Not only that, but she is really nice and super professional. No waiting around hours for her to start, and her time estimates per service are very accurate. I'd recommend Tam to any and everyone!

name: ms p
text: This is a very professional and comfortable environment to get hair services. I love it!

name: Tish Lowman
text: It a very nice place . I really enjoy getting my hair done there.  I would recommend it to anyone.

name: Chandra Bozeman
text: Tamara is an expert on growing and styling hair. Her natural, homemade, plant derived products are a MUST and are great for all types of hair!

name: Natalie Ross
text:
Kia is absolutely awesome she always does a great job with my hair and every time my hair feels great after.
Thank you Kia.

name: Malaysia Ford
text: She’s the best there is. I don’t trust anyone else with my hair!

name: Courtney Sibley
text: My V-Steam experience was awesome. Not only was the experience serene and relaxing but it was also educational as well. Tamara and her staff make sure you understand the process, answer any and all questions and they make sure you are comfortable throughout the entire experience.  They make sure you feel pampered. V-Steam is wonderful for the health of your “V” and I would recommend that  EVERY WOMAN at least try it. You will not regret it!!!

name: A Vines
text: Tamara was highly recommended by a friend for her knowledge of how to “care for” damaged hair and revive it to health again. Upon my initial “consultation” visit with my two daughters, we were greeted professionally and welcomed to a warm and inviting salon. Tamara immediately assessed our hair, diagnosed our situation & gave us written prescriptions to take home to care for our hair. She did not attempt to keep secrets to get us to come back. Her honesty and professionalism turned our “consultation” visit into an appointment for all three of us. Tamara’s team immediately went to work. They continued to assess, diagnosis, treat our hair and scalp, and prescribe solutions to revive our hair. Tamara’s passion is hair, healthy hair. She is committed to educating people of all ethnicities about how to care for their hair. And yes, Tamara’s knowledge and expertise crosses ethnic and racial barriers as she has client testimonials from all ethnicities and races. To say that my daughters and I highly recommended Tam’s Natural Solutions would be an understatement. Book your appointment today!

name: Melvin Johnson
text: Tams men products go hard.  Tams products have its own natural scents that us men love. Don’t smell like hair or other grooming products.  If you have waves in your hair you will love the sea sick. The products are great.  Ohhhhj can’t leave the ladies out you you know Tam got y’all. Go out check her out

name: Leah Fields
text: Tam is a cutting edge hair stylist who offers customized packages to suit her clients needs. She emphasizes maintaining or obtaining healthy hair by using the best products and exploring a variety of hairstyles to compliment her clients. If you have natural hair or wear protective hair styles, call her today to book your consultation because you will be extremely satisfied with her services. In addition, her staff provides exceptional customer service.

name: J Bolton
text:
The stylist, salon, and the products are wonderful. 4 out of 5 people in my household have drastically different hair types and the products work for all of us.

I love the Lather series of soap—especially the charcoal with the tea tree oil, the smell is so crisp. I like the lavender as well. I love the shampoo, conditioner, gel, and hair and scalp oil.

I love everything! I just had a mini haul last Saturday.

Also, you will not find a better stylist. Every time I get “out of the chair” it’s a new me!

In addition,the shop is always clean and bright. And, I’m never in the shop waiting longer than necessary (which is very important to me!)

I like that I can make appointments from my phone and the establishment takes credit and debit with the ability to add a tip.

Is there any more I can say? Check it out for yourself 💕💕💕.

name: Rhoda Francis
text: Can’t say more about this places and the ladies here. Tamara and Brenda are the absolute best at what they do. Always so welcoming and friendly — hair looks amazing! I come every week and have been for over a year now and I am so happy with my hair. It is always glowing. So healthy. Love them!! Thank you!

name: Angela Baker
text: I would like to thank Lagunza for introducing me to the Yoni steam, and full body  Detox. My daughter and I enjoyed our time together and it was such a pleasant experience, that we plan to come back monthly.Thank you Tam, for such a warm, friendly and professional environment, that was a plus. We welcome all natural products, thanks for educating us on your natural products, can't wait to try our soap.

name: D
text: This salon is amazing! Tamara cares about your the health of your hair while maintaining a fresh look. She specializes in natural hair care and knows different hair types. She can accommodate my sensitive skin, scalp and fine hair. My hair has never been this long in my adult life. I've been going to Tamara for about 8 years and is truly satisfied!

name: Jada Pettaway
text: This is the best hair salon ever. Tamara know what she is doing. I love that all her hair products are natural and she makes them herself. When you have an appointment you never have to wait. Your appointment time is your appointment time. Her Assistant Mrs. Brenda is wonderful as well. I have never had a salon experience like this and will never go anywhere else

name: MyGirlJay
text: Love this place and it's spa-like atmosphere. The ladies are knowledgeable, funny, smart, and professional. They take care of you from your head to your toes and everything between. You leave there not only looking better but feeling better.

name: Patricia Estell
text: I highly recommend Tams Hair Salon. Very friendly ladies in a clean, beautiful salon. The atmosphere was pleasant and the services were offered in a professional manner. I will be making another appointment.

name: Sonya Wimpye
text: I’ve been going to Tam for a few years now and have yet to be disappointed. My daughter and I both go to Tam for all our natural hair needs. Shes the only one I trusted to dye my daughter’s curly hair a lighter color. She’s extremely professional and knowledgeable on all hair types. The atmosphere of the salon is warm, friendly & clean. My daughter and I will be back soon!!!

name: Tim Ingram
text: Major shout out to Tam and Lagunza for my birthday hook up!! Guys stop by and try their new men's line, Tell them Tim sent u to try the new Beast Mode shave & Shower Gel as well as the Alpha Man Conditioner!!!

name: Michelle Cochran
text: Tam’s Natural Solution the products are amazing and very affordable. I have used the shampoo, conditioner, silk out, body butter, body salt, hair reconstructor and several of the body soaps. I rate each product a 5, they are all the excellent and range in line or above any other brand. I recommend that you buy Tam’s Natural Solution, it’s great!

name: Niki Werkheiser
text: I highly recommend Tamara for all your hair care needs! I’ve been going to Tamara for 13 years and she is nothing less than amazing! And now she’s branching out into organic lotions, soaps, etc. and her products are fantastic. Check her out! #supportsmallbusiness

name: Chenelle Ball
text: Had my first Yoni steam today. I must say it was very relaxing! I felt all the week's woes just slip away. The herb smell amazing!! Tam and her team made me very comfortable. From now on the Yoni steam will be a part of my regimen.

name: Eko Cuisine
text: Tamara is simply the best I know, friendly and wonderful members staff and they will always give you the best... try and see for yourself

name: Whitney Heard
text: Tams salon is awsome! She gets me in and out in a timely fashion! Her hand-crafted products are the best, and this is my forever salon!

name: Nichole Staples
text: Tamara has been my stylist for over 15 years. She never disappoints. She always know what style that better suits me. Skin products are amazing. Thanks Tamara❤️

name: Amberly G
text: Tamara is an amazing stylist ! She knows exactly what your hair needs . The salon has a great atmosphere. I always leave pleased and ready for my next visit ! ! You won’t regret making an appointment with her.

name: julie jolly
text: Love this lady. She takes really good care of me and my mom's hair. If you are looking to rock a short hair do, then you need to call Tamara today.

name: Jasmine Spruill-Young
text:
Yesterday, I experienced my 2nd yoni steam at Tam's Natural Solution. My first steam was 2 weeks ago and I had no idea what to expect from the treatment. The customer service was amazing. Prior to my first appointment,  I had questions, so I messaged Tam and she got me in touch with Gunza. Gunza called me and chatted with me about the benefits of the steam and how it would assist me with personal health goals. At the time, I had heard about the benefits of the steam and thought I would try it.

My first appointment was amazing. Gunza and Tam greeted me with a smile and took me to a private place  to chat. It was a personal experience with a service that catered to your comfort. My second appointment was no different in terms of customer service. This time, I was provided a blend of herbs for my personal health need. I had a consultation with Tam and she told me more about the things that would be beneficial to me.

name: Lechara Fletcher
text: Outstanding service. I have never had a bad experience at Tams. Her handmade products are awesome. I have been using them consistently for several months

name: Andrea Boswell
text: Clean inviting atmosphere.  My hair is healthy and styled to perfection every time! Highly recommend the hair products

name: Chari Carter
text: I had my first V-Steam and I must say the atmosphere was so peaceful and it smells absolutely amazing in the shop. Tamara and her staff made me feel so comfortable and at ease and I and looking forward to my next appointment!

name: Matique Redus
text: Had an amazing first experience here! Tamara and Brenda are both so sweet and professional, and my hair has never looked or felt better! Can’t wait for my next appointment!!

name: Brenda Patterson
text: I had my 1st v steam appointment a week ago, I must confess that I was  leery .The salon was inviting and the staff was super friendly, this instantly put me at ease.i left feeling completely relaxed.i wold recommend anyone who’s interested in having a vsteam done use Tam’s you want be disappointed

name: Brandon Faiella
text: I bought some beard oil and some soap from her and it is by far the best I’ve used. Plus, it’s all organic so I’m not worried about putting a bunch of chemicals on my skin

name: Jason Pearce
text: I have been going to Tamara since I moved to the area. She does a great job cutting my hair!

name: Lisa allen
text:
I made an appt for my mother and I.  Spoke extensively to Brenda explained we would come in 15 mins early to fill out paperwork.   Drove over an hour.   When we got there the place was locked up and no lights on.  When we talked to someone they said they gave our appts to someone else.....not sure how that's possible when we were there and there were no cars in parking lot and lights were off.  Looks like they decided to take day off instead of keeping appointment that was scheduled for days.  Horrible customer service and really put us out of our way...3 hours round trip driving w no apology.

In regards to your response that is not true at all.  When I talked to someone on the phone they said they gave our appts to someone else and we could come back at 6:00.

I also explained when I made the appt I could not go online because I did not have service I was traveling.  Which is why we agreed that we would come in early.

The fact that you are saying we didnt show up is an out right lie.

resp.text: We so sorry you had a bad experience.  We pride ourselves with customers service.   We requested that you make online appointment, but we made special accommodations for your appointment.   In preparation for your appointment for  today we arrived early and no one was here.  We even checked the cameras, there must be a miscommunication.   Please email us so that we can resolve this!

name: Barbara Donovan
text: I keep coming back to Tamara time and time again for her experience, professionalism, value and fast service. She makes me shine.😊

name: Yarnell Mutumba
text: Great atmosphere! Tam is extremely professional and knowledgeable about hair health! The time spent there was pleasant and fast!

name: Tonya Washington
text: Excellent service. Tam is down to earth and has such a good spirit! She's my new stylist!

name: Erika Harvey
text: Not only is Tamara a talented and knowledgeable stylist, she also makes her styling products to promote hair health.

name: Pamela Tippit
text: Tam was able to help repair and grow my fragile and damaged hair all while making me feel right at home! A that was a HUGE task! I also love the smell and feel of her organic products ❤

name: Anthony Morris
text: I'm loving the products amazin smells 👍thank you Tam's much success 😊

name: Lacquicia Smith
text: Tam’s products are amazing,  the service from Tamara and her staff are excellent. I wouldn’t go anywhere else.

name: Angela Williams
text: Tamara provides excellent service & makes the best products. Highly recommend!

name: Anthony Morris
text: I'm loving the products amazin smells 👍thank you Tam's much success 😊

name: Nicholas Emmanuel
text: are you searching for the best natural hair stylist in Madison? Look no further, Tamara is your girl

name: Ashia Mitchel
text: The private V-Steam session was excellent!!! I will be back soon😁😉

name: Handsome Kid
text: I LOVE my beautician! Her scalp detox is EVERYTHING, I had to jave my own bottle!!!

name: Barbara Watkins
text: When we went for appt, the building was locked and no one was there. I guess because we were from out of town, they really didn't care. It wasted half a day of our vacation, but I guess it wasn't a concern for them.

name: Deanna Williams
text: Never a wait friendly customer service done to beautify you

name: Yualonda Smith
text: Best Salon in Huntsville, Al!

name: Lori Sumlin
text: Wonderful stylist!

name: Lee Nocella
text: An Awesome Experience:  I was called back immediately upon arrival and no one wasted any time.  I had my procedure and was in and out in under 40 minutes. The PA was knowledgeable and got the job done.  I appreciate their expertise

name: Larry Fine
text:
As always great experience.Faith and Dr G
Were fantastic. Everyone  is do pleasant from the time you walk in until you walk out the door. Outstanding Doctor and staff. Gotta mention Julie, she stitches you after surgery. Best I've ever seen.  No scars. Plus she is really a sweet lady.
Larry Fine

name: Ellen Doughty
text: I have been a patient of Dr Ginsburg since around 2006. He has a true talent and passion for his work. He is easy to talk to. Dr Ginsburg and his staff are very knowledgeable about the many services he offers. My mother, dad, sister, and niece all believe he is the best around.

name: Pati Helms
text: I immediately felt comfortable with the entire staff.  It was as if I already knew them. Waiting for biopsies to come back and I will be back......

name: Eric Phillips
text: Professional, courteous, and timely. I am exceedingly pleased with my interactions at this office. I never had a “wait,” as the intake nurse handed me off directly to the PA, who then handed me off to the doctor and a med student while she stayed and they all discussed there with me. I received two quick biopsies and an order for a face cream... which they actually had on site for like 30 bucks. I’ll be back here with any future skin concerns or cosmetic needs.

name: Katie Hart
text: Dr. Ginsburg removed a squamous cell cancer from the lower right side of my face a week ago.  It was the best experience I have ever had in a doctor's office.  There was no waiting; all of the employees were super nice and did everything they could to make me comfortable; the office is the cleanest place I have ever been in and there is a calming slow-paced atmosphere in the office.  However, the best thing about this experience is that Dr. Ginsburg did a super job of removing the cancer without creating a scar--this looks better than the last squamous cell cancer I had removed by a plastic surgeon.  The whole procedure was done in the office.  I could not be more pleased.  Dr. Ginsburg will be my dermatologist as long as he is available.

name: Redwhiteandblue ///
text: The entire staff are all so friendly and personable unlike others.They make sure you are comfortable even providing a blanket while I was waiting on the lab.  No long waiting times•always right on time.  Can’t rate Dr. Ginsburg and his staff highly enough!

name: Peggy Lewis
text: I was afraid to have Liposuction at 67 years old, but the staff was so honest and caring. They answered every question that I needed to feel comfortable. Dr. Ginsburg was calm, and had a lot of patience. Loving my results! !

name: Pam Jones
text: My visits with Dr. Ginsberg are always very  pleasant. He is very knowledgeable, his bedside manner is wonderful, and his treatments are always 100% effective!

name: Susan Burrow
text: Very polite and professional environment. Received excellent dermatology care. I would recommend Dr. Ginsburg and his staff for your derm needs. Little to no wait time because they were so well organized.

name: Shaneeka Phillips
text: Dr. Ginsburg is so awesome. He makes you feel like an old friend. He is knowledgeable and experience has been a wonderful teacher. I was impressed with Dr. Ginsburg and the entire staff.

name: Dana Holbdy
text: Dr. Ginsburg and the lovely nurse Julie were awesome. I had my stretched earlobes repaired. They did an awesome job. I felt completely comfortable with them. They answered all my questions and made sure I knew exactly what to do for my post op care. I’ll be returning in a couple of weeks to have my spider veins treated.

name: Cathy Smitherman
text: This was my first time here and I will definitely be back. Everyone was so nice and friendly.

name: Ellen Brake
text: I always enjoy my visits at Ginsburg Dermatology.I have been going there for over 25 years. I know some of the staff by name. They are friendly and helpful. I've had skin cancers and moles removed. Also, botox and other injections. I really like the fillers too. I highly recommend Ginsburg Dermatology.

name: Ella Snead
text: I have been using Dr. Ginsburg for at least 35 years.  I think he is the best!!!  His staff is always so congenial and professional.  So I would recommend him highly.

name: selena gibbons
text: Wow, this was a great experience.. I have already recommended Dr. Ginsburg's practice to someone else.  He has a great team.. He has wonderful bedside manners and he is very attentive to your concerns.

name: Shaundale Ben
text: The front receptionist was super nice,  friendly and attentive! The assistant who tooke to my room was very knowledgeable about the procedure in question, she was friendly as well and helped my visit go faster due to her knowledge. Dr. Ginsburg is a nice man, he made sure I was comfortable amd had no questions before he left out! I will be having my procedure SOON!!!!!

name: Erin Ludwick
text: My son and I had a great experience with the doctors and staff at Ginsberg Dermatology.

name: Rae-Ann Spears
text: Got attended to as soon as I arrived for my appointment. My questions were throughly answered and several options for treatment were recommended.

name: Ruby Mordecai
text: I went for an itchy skin peeling rash on my hands.  He never did a biopsy and said I would just have to maintain it.  Gave me wet wraps and cream.  For two years I put up this.  I finally went to another dermatologist and they immediately did biopsy and found out exactly what I have.

name: Bre Flan
text: Clean facility. Exceptional Covid-19 precautions. Friendly and professional staff. Very helpful and willing to give insight on any problem you have. I would recommend to everyone!

name: Carrie Macon
text: Dr. Ginsburg and staff were incredibly professional, helpful, friendly and quick! I appreciate you all! Thank you!

name: Mickie Harris
text: No matter what your skin issue, Dr. Ginsburg and his amazing team are eager to listen to you to find a resolution that fits your needs and budget.  Dr. Ginsburg takes his time and doesn’t make you feel rushed.  He does not frivolously recommend treatments or procedures. On my most recent visit, he actually “lost” money.  I was going to get a chemical peel and he told me that I didn’t have enough skin discoloration to warrant one.  How about that?  I appreciate that he is candid and tells you what you don’t need, but can also make recommendations for other available and beneficial skin treatment options.  I just want to age gracefully - but with the professional guidance and assistance from Dr. Ginsburg.

name: Christina Conklin
text: There are no words to express how amazing Dr. Ginsburg is! Last year I went to a plastic surgeon for a consult for chin and neck lipo and had a horrible experience and it scared me away from procedure. My mom recommended I go see Dr Ginsburg since he did her Lazer lipo on her legs years ago. During my consult he made me feel super confident in my decision to move forward with procedure and I knew I was in good hands. I had my procedure in April  I'm in shock at already how amazing I look. I have the jaw line I've always dreamed of! Dr. Ginsburg has personally called and checked on me 4 times since my procedure and I've never had such a personable experience from a doctor! He  doesn't know it but he has changed my life!

name: Jennifer Seales
text: Got there early and was able to go right in when I called to check in. Everyone was very professional and friendly.

name: Leon Reese
text: I have been a patient due to skin cancer for many years.  Dr. Ginsburg and his staff have always been helpful, pleasant and professional.  Excellent care.

name: Patricia McCullum
text: Professional, courteous, and timely. I am exceedingly pleased with my interactions at this office.

name: Emmanuel Ross
text: This Was My First Time So It Was Good Highly Recommended

name: Lovely Looney
text: The staff is genuinely helpful and makes you feel at home amongst family & friends. I'm definitely pleased with the quality of care they provide for me. I would recommend Ginsburg Dermatology Center.

name: DeJa Waller
text: The office employers was very nice and polite. I love it here.

name: kelly waldrop
text: Dr. Ginsburg has been my dermatologist for 15+ years I can’t imagine going anywhere else, so glad he switched the mouth wash when we check in! Tastes Great!

name: Ashia M
text: Dr. Ginsburg is very knowledgeable and will get the job done. Although, not the best with explaining the treatments and directions, works really quick. I would recommend him since I’ve went to several Dermatologist that act as if they didn’t have a clue, and he diagnosed me in 10 seconds. Receptionist was very friendly and facility was nice.

name: Mellissa Goetz
text: Had a great experience with Dr. Ginsengber and his wonder staff. I've been wanting to get my chin liposuctioned for years. No matter my weight and because of family traits I always hated my side view profile and being 42 I know it would only get worse. I watched a bunch of YouTube videos to prepare for what was gonna happen. Then next morning after my procedure I took the wrapping off my head to clean and change out the pads and I was blown away! And with saying that, I know I'm still swollen so my results will only get better! No more double chin!! This will be a great boost I needed and wish I had of done it years ago!

name: Nichole B
text: My daughter is very comfortable coming to Ginsburg Dermatology for her acne.  Everyone is very nice and they take time to listen to her.

name: Jennifer Earles
text: Having my smartlipo procedure was one of the BEST things I've ever done for myself. The entire staff was wonderful in making me comfortable and the procedure was pretty simple too!

name: Diane Wright
text:
I have been seeing Dr. Ginsburg for almost 40 years. He and his staff are always kind, caring and efficient.
I was very impressed with the Covid precautions they practice.

name: Patricia Wilson
text: My visit to Ginsburg Dermatology was a very great experience,the staff was friendly and considerate,the nurse practitioner let me know what was going on with hair and told me what meds they were going to put me on.Dr.Ginsburg was very thorough about the treatment that I would be receiving for hair loss,I was very satisfied and would definitely refer them to a friend or family member.

name: Amy Naylor
text: Amazing staff. Very covid conscious. Excellent service. Very safe and excellent care.

name: allen weldon
text: The office in very quick to get u in. Also you don’t feel like you are going to get the COVID Disease very safe the way they use there policy on the virus. Dr. Ginsburg and his staff will keep you informed the whole time you are there.

name: Athena Johnson
text: Always great experience!  Dr. Ginsburg is a very smart doctor. He can't cure my lupus, so he makes living with it easier.

name: Jennifer Minkler
text: Love the office, the doctor and the Receptionist was the nicest person ever! Highly recommend!!

name: Patricia Perry
text: Absolutely love this Doctor and his clinic, very professional, knows what he is doing, knows what you want, and delivers exceptional results.I lost a lot of volume in my face and he did a amazing job with Bellafill. You will not be disappointed...I am thrilled with the results and everything at great prices.

name: Josette Curry
text: Dr. Ginsburg and his team is very pleasant, friendly, and knowledgeable. I am very happy with the outcome on my visit to his office.

name: Althea Raines
text: Beautiful environment. EVERYONE was enjoyable and nice. Made me comfortable enough to go through the unknown..... Looking forward to our future together.

name: Robin Kolber
text: From the parking lot to the exam and treatment, all was EXCELLENT!

name: Lee Long
text: Fantastic! Great filler experience - I had my lips and forehead done. Very pleased. I appreciate the attention to detail for each area and how the results turned out.

name: Marsha Smith-Horstead
text:
I loved the attention that was given to my concerns.
I thoroughly enjoyed my visit.

name: Myrna Pittman
text: Very prompt and Doctor explained everything very thoroughly. Everyone was professional and very polite.

name: Myrna Pittman
text: Very prompt and Doctor explained everything very thoroughly. Everyone was professional and very polite.

name: Opal Jackson Cakmak
text: Dr Gingsberg is the greatest!! I have used him for many reasons and  trust his knowledge and expertise.  His staff is knowledgeable, professional and caring. I highly recommend Dr. Ginsburg for any dermatology needs as well as cosmetic concerns

name: Alyssa Falkner
text: Great staff, super friendly and answered all my questions!

name: D Hall
text: Friendly staff. Very professional. Quality treatment. Swift service.

name: Caitlynn Darby
text: I drive 2 hours to see Dr. Ginsburg and his PA. SO worth it!! The staff is amazing and has truly helped when no one else could. Thanks you guys for you listening to me and helping me get well! I’ll always refer my friends and family to you guys.

name: Leniqua Wood
text: Everyone was so professional & nice. I love them!!❤️

I have been seeing Dr. GINSBURG for 18 or maybe 19 years now. He has been taking great care of me that long. I would
recommend him to anyone! He is a true professional & takes his work very seriously. And, we have become friends & that is very special!

name: Gail Owen
text: I have been using Dr. Ginsberg for several years. He is the best and make sure he don’t miss a spot that needs a biopsy. I would not use anyone else.

name: Sanquinetta Dawson
text: MY EXPERIENCE WITH DR. GINSBURG WAS EXCEPTIONAL!!!!!! HE REMOVED A CYST FROM MY BACK AND GAVE MY SON ,WHO ACCOMPANIED ME, THOROUGH INSTRUCTIONS AFTERWARDS AND I WILL GIVE KUDOS TO HIS ASSISTANTS WHO WERE VERY REASSURING AND KIND. AGAIN THANK YOU DR. GINSBURG!!!!!!!

text: Pleasant atmosphere and friendly staff. They made me instantly feel comfortable and helped with a treatment plan that works best for me.

text: They are very nice and caring they made me feel warm and welcome.

name: susannah fields
text: I have had Botox and filler‘s throughout the years and his work is tremendous and does wonderful work! He checks my skin for sun damage and pre-cancerous spots and does an  amazing quick job and very efficient.. He is efficient and quick with all of his work I recommend him to everybody!!

name: Shanique Story
text: Great place great ppl. Problem solved.

text: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Ginsburg’s Office. Wonderful procedure and great staff. Dr. Ginsburg is a wonderful dermatologist.

text: I have been seeing Dr. G for about 3.5-4 years now. He has helped me with everything from adult acne to anti aging treatment! He has helped me feel confident in my own skin. He is definitely one of the coolest doctors in his field and is basically a one stop shop when it comes to dermatology. I love that I can treat myself to his spa as well! GO SEE HIM!!!! Highly recommend.

name: Judy Wilson
text: I feel very comfortable with Dr. Ginsburg and his staff. They are not only very professional but kind and caring. My spouse and I wouldn't consider going to anyone else! Thank you, Dr. G

name: Monica Watson
text: After researching for a couple of months I decide to contact Dr. Ginsburg's office for a consult. From the moment I walked through the door I knew this was the place for me. All of my questions were answered and I felt at ease. I can't say enough about his wonderful bedside manner, his awesome front office staff and one of the best nurses I've ever met. Dr. Ginsburg even texted to check on me after my procedure. I would give him ten stars if I could!

name: Pat Hamilton McMurrey
text:
In around 1996-97, I had liposuction at Ginsburg Dermatology Ctr. The first time I went, I spend around $3500 for Dr G to remove a very small patch of stubborn belly fat. That went well, or at least I thought so. The next year I went back and got him to remove excess fat around my ankles, knees and "love handles", another $3000 and then several trips to have saline injections in varicose veins.  I was pretty pleased with the results. Now, after a little over 20 years, I have a Huge hernia on my belly which 2 surgeons have assured me my insurance will not pay to fix because it is caused by previous damage to my stomach muscles that has allowed my stomach to sag through but not my intestines! Also, I have horrible huge purplish red areas around my ankles which my current dermatologist has assured me is lipodermatosclerosis. It is inflammation in the under-skin layer of fat. Not much to do about that either.
I am really unhappy to have spent nearly $7000 only to have my body RUINED in the long run!!! Be very careful about what you have done and ALWAYS get a second opinion.

name: Jeanette Cosby
text: Great people

name: Eleanor Rose Godfrey-Burnick
text:
I've been using Dr. G for about 9 years now. Each and every time I walk out, I feel as it's 1) been done right the first time, and 2) he know what he's doing, always!

About a month or so ago, I found something on my face, that I knew didn't belong there. Last week, Dr. G. cut off and biopsied it. The following day I got a phone call saying it wound up being a Squamous  Cell Carcinoma. After doing a slew of research (probably something one shouldn't do on their own) Dr. G said, 'Calm down, and don't worry. If you gotta get one, that's the one you want!'

So, yesterday morning Dr. G completed the procedure using what he called the 'Mohs Procedure' of removing it. Thankfully, he got all of it the first time. Talk about relief...

24 hours later, one wouldn't know I had anything done, other than the band aid (across the underside of my nose) a bit of swelling and now it's starting to turn black and blue.

Trust me, if you need something dermatological, Botox/Fillers injections, etc., he's your guy! I promise you, he won't do anything you don't need done!

And, he's the absolute best!!

name: M Gray
text: I could not be more pleased with my lipo experience performed by Dr Ginsberg!!  He and Julie make an amazing team!  Their professionalism and wonderful bedside manner made this experience totally worth while.  I am seriously wondering what took me so long to pull the trigger and go forward with the procedure.  I had done my research and after two kids and a few stubborn areas I was finally ready to go for it after my consultation.  I went in for my consult last Wednesday and scheduled my procedure for this morning.  I asked lots of questions to have a better understanding of what to expect. Julie forewarned me about the feeling of bee stings to provide the numbing solution and for me, it actually was not bad at all! Everyone will have a different experience and pain tolerance varies of course but after the numbing solution was put in at one point while Dr Ginsberg was working on my sides I was LITERALLY laughing!! I had absolutely no discomfort during the procedure nor afterwards.  Julie has an amazing voice- the conversation was wonderful and all in all I keep asking myself ‘what took me so long!’  I was able to drive myself home and am currently experiencing no discomfort 5hours post procedure- just staying on a towel to absorb the drainage!  Thank Dr Ginsberg for making this a memorable experience in the best way! Looking forward to the swelling going down and seeing the results after a while. If you are on the fence- this is your guy!  Go for it!  You will be glad you did!!

name: Kelly Mcmahan
text: Great patient care! Nice office and knowledgeable staff.

name: Mary Cooley
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Ginsburg for over 20 years, with him treating many medical issues.  Yesterday, he performed smartlipo on my abdomen and love handles. I cannot say enough wonderful things about him and his nurse, Julie. Today, still swollen with the fluid they infuse, I can see a difference in my abdomen. I can't wait to see the final result. I would never use another physician for any medical or cosmetic issues that he treats. He, in my opinion, is the best dermatologist in our area. I highly recommend him. And the entire procedure is virtually painless. I took one day off, and have already resumed normal activity less than 24 hrs after the procedure. I love you , Dr. Ginsburg!!!

name: Patrice Williams
text: As usual Dr Ginsburg is great!!

name: Chelaine Wright
text: I've been a patient of Dr. Ginsburg's for over 25 years!! He is my dermatological  "guru!!!" From acne to anti-aging treatments, he has been there for me!! I trust his expertise completely. The cosmetic procedures that he performs on me are always natural looking. He is very conscientious when it comes to any and all procedures. He wants to ensure that the patient looks and feels they're very best! Thank you so much Dr. Barry Ginsburg!!!

text: The staff here is always so sweet and helpful. Dr. G really cares about his patients and their care. Highly recommend this office to anyone

name: Catherine F
text: Dr Ginsburg is the BEST!!! He treats me like I'm his personal art project! He takes the time to explain everything in detail. Most importantly, he never rushes me through like I'm on an assembly line like other doctors do!

text: Dr. Ginsburg and his staff are the best, they have changed my life for sure! I was attack with an acne plague (straight pizza face) and now my face is smoother and clearer than a baby's bottom. I am now contemplating smart laser liposuction for a better sculpted body. People, hurry and see him before he retires. Thanks Dr. Ginsburg!

name: Emily Vonbartheld
text: I went with a friend for a consultation with Dr. Ginsburg. The staff are incredible, and Dr. Ginsburg truly cares about his clients. He was honest, respectful, and helpful. I’d absolutely recommend this clinic to anyone looking for top quality aesthetic surgery!

name: Cindy Dyer
text: Very nice and professional!

name: Avery Wyatt
text: I had a wonderful experience at Ginsburg Dermatology. The staff was so kind and made sure I was comfortable. I highly recommend Dr. Ginsburg and his staff!

name: Douglas Benefield
text: As soon as you walk in the office, you know your experience will be delightful. Dr. Ginsberg and his staff are wonderful and kind!! Thank you again for all that you do!!

name: Ty S.
text:
I am 40+ fit & active with stubborn fat areas despite diet and exercise after 2 pregnancies. Dr Ginsburg performed 360 Smart Lipo on my abs and flanks 11/28/18, his down to earth personality and singing nurse Julie put me at ease during the procedure which although totally numb locally I was fully awake. We laughed a lot and I didn’t mind the procedure one bit. Dr G called me personally that night to check on me and Candace was awesome at answering any post care questions and addressing any of my concerns as I healed. Nurse Julie and the Dr were willing to call if I needed but Candace is so knowledgeable it’s likely unecassary.

This was a life changing procedure for me as no matter how much I exercised or how much weight I lost, that ugly c-shelf and love handles were always there. Now it’s totally gone and my silhouette is lovely as it was pre- pregnancy...over 25 years before my first child! Dr G told me what my outcome would be according to his experience and expertise. My significant other witnessed the procedure, the healing process, and now the joy of me loving my midsection again. I am snatched!!!

Listen, you can trust Dr Ginsburg and his staff. He is the best available so if you’re debating and searching then look no further. Trust him to reshape you and then follow post surgery instructions. I have 2 more areas of concern and he has proven himself to be my choice again.

name: Rhonda Bonds
text: Always a great fun experience at Ginsburg Dermatology

name: Me
text: Bellafill has changed my life. I’ve had debilitating acne scars  and I’ve tried many different treatments but Bellafill is the only one that had made a difference. I can even go without makeup.  I highly recommend the triple bleach cream and continue to get Botox from Dr Ginsburg.

name: Regina Hall
text: I had lipo done last week and Dr. Ginsburg  was very nice and concerned about my comfort and my results. I could see results as soon as I was off the table. There was no pain during or after. The nurse was great, she was tentative to my every need. I would do it again in a moment and I will be in effect months, inner thighs and knees next. Don't be afraid ,just do it. I saw nothing wrong with the procedure room everything looked clean to me.

text: I have been going to Dr Ginsburg for my skin issues. Love his staff and how well he has taken care of any issues And concerns I have had. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
